metadata.name: Suspicious Ping/Del Command Combination
metadata.comment: Detects a method often used by ransomware. Which combines the "ping" to wait a couple of seconds and then "del" to delete the file in question. Its used to hide the file responsible for the initial infection for example

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —n ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―n '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nul')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -f ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /f ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –f ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —f ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―f ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -q ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /q ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –q ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —q ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―q '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ping')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('del ')))

output.summary: Detects a method often used by ransomware. Which combines the "ping" to wait a couple of seconds and then "del" to delete the file in question. Its used to hide the file responsible for the initial infection for example
